channel.title: NPC Detail
channel.description: I know to do all of the [u]beginner stuff[/u] like changing items, NPCs, and objects. :confused: How would i be able to use the options of that object....Such as putting armor on or stealing from a stall. It would also be appreciated if someone would tell me how to name my server and how to say the [SERVER NOTICE]: ..... thing. Thank You for your help :D

item.title: NPC Detail
item.dc:creator: @xLICENSE2KILLx xLICENSE2KILLx
item.description:
@xLICENSE2KILLx wrote:

Mendorphis how do i find the name?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Detail
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

You need to use packets. firstClickObject, secondClickObject etc.

As for the name, search for the current name and change it - and for server announcments you need to send a globalMessage every 60 seconds or so (but they are annoying and gay).

Read full topic
